## and variable

Returns true if both arguments are true; otherwise false.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
and: <T, U>(a: T, b: U) => T extends Falsy ? false : U extends Falsy ? false : boolean
```

## Example


```ts
and(true, true) // true
and(false, true) // false
and(true, false) // false
and(false, false) // false

```
